name: RJM Decision Maker
description:
Rev. Jon Micheals has created a Decision Maker. Use your spiritual power to find the answers to your questions. This device is easy to use think about your question and then push the button. 

There are 7 choice engines making a selection of 7 choices with each push of the button. These totals are then added and balanced between the number of choices. 

"Good Luck!"
